properties.name: pragmatic.completeLabeling.enabled
properties.description: Enables The Quality Criteria Complete Labeling for Pragmatic Analysis.

properties.name: pragmatic.edgeCrossing.enabled
properties.description: Enables The Quality Criteria Edge Crossing for Pragmatic Analysis.

properties.name: pragmatic.sourcesAndSinks.enabled
properties.description: Enables The Quality Criteria Sources and Sinks for Pragmatic Analysis.

properties.name: pragmatic.sourcesAndSinks.maxStartEvents
properties.description: Configures the maximum allowed amount of StartEvents.

properties.name: pragmatic.sourcesAndSinks.maxEndEvents
properties.description: Configures the maximum allowed amount of EndEvents.
